attributes.action: prevent football fixtures from being change for television coverage. Changes from scheduled saturday fixtures to Mondays and now Thursdays are just unacceptable to the average football supporter.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Football is a working class sport and british citizens must have the right to be able to freely attend football matches on a Saturday or Sunday when they traditionally have no work commitments. We the genuine football supporters are sick and tired of fixture changes forcing us to take time off work (holiday leave or faking sick) just to accomodate TV fixtures. We have a right to be able to attend a football match or cinema or other form of entertainment at the weekend which is traditionally our leisure time.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
